-e ---

𓋫 ⇔ sit steh

𓋫 #scat shoulder-knot

𓋫 𓈗 | pour (water) | schütten

𓋴 𓄝 𓅂 𓌙 𓀀 | Asiatics | A'Siatan ≠ side Schotten scots
𓄝 𓏏 𓅂 𓌙 𓀀 𓅱 𓉐 | Asiatics |
𓋫 𓏏 𓅂 𓏥 | Asiatics |
𓋫 𓍿 𓏏 𓈉 | Asiatics |

𓇿 𓅨 𓋫 | larboard | left side of boat, “port” Backbord
𓇿 𓅨 𓋫 | larboard | αριστερό aristeró ≠stern !!

ἀριστερός aristerós, “left” ⇔ Easter

ἄριστος (áristos, “best”) + -τερος (-teros, “contrastive suffix”)
